title: unable  to connect  to game servers
body:
my  league of  legends wont connect to the game  servers 

i have tried uninstalling and initiated full repair but nothing worked 
also i have tried hextech support
plz help{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Just in case if you have bitdefender installed it has a new update which stops league matches from launching. Just disable Advanced Threat Defense and your client should launch the game after champ select.
